items.sentence: Why didn\'t you tell Tom you couldn\'t do that without his help?
Tom probably won\'t be able to cope with the problem by himself.
Tom wouldn\'t even talk to Mary after she had apologized to him.
Tom and Mary told me that they\'re thinking about getting a dog.
Don\'t tell Tom that Mary isn\'t planning on helping his mother.
I ate something earlier this evening that didn\'t agree with me.
Mary has a huge crush on Tom, but she\'s too shy to talk to him.
Never ask a question if you aren\'t prepared to hear the answer.
My mother has a driver\'s license, but she doesn\'t drive a car.
If anybody had asked me if I were married, I\'d have said I was.
